snippet: Federal health officials confirmed the death of a 61-year-old Ohio woman and said 14 other victims had been hospitalized by the new strain.
abstract: Federal health officials confirm the death of a 61-year-old Ohio woman from a new strain of pig flu, and say that 14 other victims have been hospitalized.
lead_paragraph: Federal health officials confirmed the death of a 61-year-old Ohio woman and said 14 other victims had been hospitalized by the new strain.

headline.main: First Death Is Reported From New Pig Flu Strain
headline.print_headline: First Death Is Reported From New Pig Flu Strain
